name: Lavapools
description: Dodge death in a rising hell! No weapons. Only dodging, pure skill and understanding regular patterns.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7+ Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 8800GS / ATI Radeon HD 3870 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

reviews.review_text: Silly, Fun, well polished, hardcore game.  GOD DAMN IT SCROLLING LEVEL xD
